field.name: summary
field.value: Bug in StringTokenizer for repeated tokens

field.name: description
field.value: If a string to be tokenized contains part of one token repeated in another token, that second token will be tokenized incorrectly. For example, if the string to be tokenized is "Test1,Test1234" the tokens returned will be "Test1" and "234".

comment.author: scarpen
comment.text: Added a patch that fixes this behavior. Also added tests for StringTokenizer. The patch is for the Tools/NVelocity folder.

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: * '''Type''' changed from ''Bug'' to ''Patch''. * '''Assignees''' set to ''Jonathon Rossi''.

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Applied''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''Future''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
